title: Pom Wonderful Presents: The Greatest Movie Ever Sold -- Official Trailer 2011 [HD]
description:
Genre: Documentary
Cast: Morgan Spurlock, Ben Silverman, Brett Ratner, Quentin Tarantino, Noam Chomsky, Ralph Nader, Brian Steinberg, Robert Weisman, Donald Trump
Director: Morgan Spurlock

Plot:
A documentary about branding, advertising and product placement that is financed and made possible by brands, advertising and product placement.

Release Date: April 22nd 2011
